email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out with a freight offer for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the high side. Given current market conditions, we were hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Can you check with the owner if they’re willing to adjust? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I spoke with the owner, and they’re willing to come down to $50.00 per metric ton. They’re firm on this rate given the vessel’s availability and the tight laycan. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. We can accept $50.00 per metric ton, provided the demurrage rate is reasonable. Can you confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please confirm the vessel’s details and laycan once more. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the demurrage rate is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m, and the laycan remains October 15-20. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. We’re good to proceed at $50.00 per metric ton with the demurrage rate as stated. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll have the charter party agreement sent over to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah
